prompt: A photorealistic portrait of a middle-aged man with fair skin, shaved head, showing a clear sadness facial expression (gloomy look), ultra-detailed RAW color photo, 85mm lens, shallow depth of field, studio portrait, highly detailed skin, pores visible, sharp eyes, soft key light, rim light, natural color grading, cinematic lighting, high dynamic range, 8k master
